016package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.controller;
017
018import android.content.Intent;
019import android.media.MediaPlayer;
020import android.os.Bundle;
021import android.view.Menu;
022import android.view.MenuItem;
023import android.widget.Button;
024import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
025import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
026import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
027import androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment;
028import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
029import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.R;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.GameField;
032import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
033import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.viewmodel.PreferencesViewModel;
034
035/**
036 * Serves as a basic container activity&mdash;that is, it presents no UI elements of its own (apart
037 * from an options menu), but hosts a {@link NavHostFragment} for presentation of one or more
038 * {@link androidx.fragment.app.Fragment} instances, associated with a navigation graph.
039 * <p>In addition to the navigation host role, this activity demonstrates the
040 * handling of:</p>
041 * <ul><li><p>user sign-out (initiated by selection of an options menu item), with automatic
042 * navigation back to {@link LoginActivity} on completion of the sign-out;</p></li>
043 * <li><p>user-initiated navigation to {@link SettingsActivity};</p></li>
044 * <li><p>updates of UI {@link android.view.View} widget properties based on preference values
045 * (obtained from {@link PreferencesViewModel});</p></li>
046 * <li><p>key events in the permissions request flow.</p></li></ul>
047 */
048@AndroidEntryPoint
049public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
050
051  MediaPlayer mediaPlayer;
052  GameField gameField;
053  Button playButton;
054  Button settingsButton;
055  Button scoresButton;
056  Button exitButton;
057  private LoginViewModel loginViewModel;
058
059  @Override
060  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
061    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
062    setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
063    mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.main_menu);
064    mediaPlayer.start();
065    setupNavigation();
066    setupViewModels();
067
068    playButton = findViewById(R.id.play);
069    playButton.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
070      Intent intent = new Intent(this, GameActivity.class);
071      mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.onclick);
072      mediaPlayer.start();
073      startActivity(intent);
074    });
075
076    settingsButton = findViewById(R.id.settings);
077    settingsButton.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
078      Intent intent = new Intent(this, SettingsActivity.class);
079      mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.onclick);
080      mediaPlayer.start();
081      startActivity(intent);
082    });
083
084    scoresButton = findViewById(R.id.scores);
085    scoresButton.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
086      Intent intent = new Intent(this, ScoresActivity.class);
087      mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.onclick);
088      mediaPlayer.start();
089      startActivity(intent);
090
091    });
092
093    exitButton = findViewById(R.id.exit);
094    exitButton.setOnClickListener((v) -> {
095      mediaPlayer = MediaPlayer.create(this, R.raw.onclick);
096      mediaPlayer.start();
097      finish();
098    });
099  }
100
101
102  @Override
103  protected void onDestroy() {
104    super.onDestroy();
105    if (mediaPlayer != null) {
106      mediaPlayer.release();
107      mediaPlayer = null;
108    }
109  }
110
111  @Override
112  public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) {
113    super.onCreateOptionsMenu(menu);
114    getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.main_options, menu);
115    return true;
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem item) {
120    boolean handled = true;
121    int itemId = item.getItemId();
122    if (itemId == R.id.settings) {
123      Intent intent = new Intent(this, SettingsActivity.class);
124      startActivity(intent);
125    } else if (itemId == R.id.sign_out) {
126      loginViewModel.signOut();
127    } else {
128      handled = super.onOptionsItemSelected(item);
129    }
130    return handled;
131  }
132
133  @Override
134  public boolean onSupportNavigateUp() {
135    getOnBackPressedDispatcher().onBackPressed();
136    return true;
137  }
138
139
140  private void setupNavigation() {
141//    AppBarConfiguration config = new AppBarConfiguration.Builder(
142//        R.id.game_fragment, R.id.scores_fragment
143//    ).build();
144//    NavController navController = ((NavHostFragment)getSupportFragmentManager()
145//        .findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment)).getNavController();
146//    NavigationUI.setupActionBarWithNavController(this, navController, config);
147  }
148
149  private void setupViewModels() {
150    loginViewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this).get(LoginViewModel.class);
151    loginViewModel
152        .getAccount()
153        .observe(this, this::handleAccount);
154    //NavHostFragment navHostFragment =
155    //    (NavHostFragment) getSupportFragmentManager().findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment);
156  }
157
158  private void handleAccount(GoogleSignInAccount account) {
159    if (account == null) {
160      Intent intent = new Intent(this, LoginActivity.class)
161          .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
162      startActivity(intent);
163    }
164  }
165
166}
